author: alita85
content: of course! speaking of which, because the full spec is going to take a long time (lots of edge cases, editing, and tests) I can prioritize different things to whatever is necessary to unblock certain initiatives / changes that may not require the full spec to be done for every endpoint. Please feel free to reach out to me and I will happily prioritize!

author: rekmarks
content:
Have we discussed what to do for new methods, in particular those that are only implemented by wallets as opposed to clients?

For present purposes, I'm thinking of `wallet_switchEthereumChain`, which has an open draft PR that would add it has EIP-3326. MetaMask is going to ship an implementation of that method, and it'd be great to add the specification to the appropriate spot in the "new" repo.

https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/3326

author: sky.cactus
content: I am of the opinion that it should go to the same place.
